title: Middlekauff - 3 & Out - 18 game NFL season inevitable; Beer chugging phenomenon; NFL and AAF GM Phil Savage goes inside the AAF collapse
itunes:title: Middlekauff - 3 & Out - 18 game NFL season inevitable; Beer chugging phenomenon; NFL and AAF GM Phil Savage goes inside the AAF collapse
description:
Subscribe here to the 3 and Out with John Middlekauff Podcast https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/3-and-out-with-john-middlekauff/id1352730623?mt=2.

In this episode, Middlekauff explains why an 18 game NFL season is an inevitability, why the recent social media phenomenon of NFL players chugging beers is relatable to the common fan, and talks with former NFL and AAF GM Phil Savage on what went wrong with the AAF, why he has no regrets about taking the job, and working with Saban and Belichick. Follow John on twitter @JohnMiddlekauff and go to www.theherdnow.com to find the latest content. Subscribe now!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
